title: Gray River
blocka: Action: Convert any number of timer dice into fortune dice.

title: Mirror Woods,Magical
blockb: Action: Spend 8 progress to raise timber track by one.
blockc: Weather: Test: Survival 3. Failure: All characters are weary.

title: Exposed Overlook
blockb: Action: Spend progress. 4: +1 timber die. 7: +2 timber dice. 9: +3 timber dice. 10: +4 timber dice.
blockc: Calamity: A fire breaks out! Lose all progress on this location.

title: Searching the Banks
blockc: Action: Spend 6 progress. Draw stage 1 mission cards. Discard.

title: Undead Minions
blockd: Team: Test: Combat 2. Failure: +2 discord for group.

title: Scouting Ahead
blockc: Action: Spend 4 progress. Unlock Sightrock (Mission). Draw stage 2 mission cards. Discard.

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Effect: all characters at this location have +1 lore.
blockb: Sorcery: Test: Lore 2. Failure: One character is shaken.

title: Undead Minions
blockd: Team: Test: Combat 2. Failure: +2 discord for group.

title: The Necromancer's Dark Heart
blockc: Action: Spend 6 progress. Unlock Oniri (Character). Discard.
blockd: Weird: Test: Lore 3. Failure: One character is wounded.

title: Scouting Ahead
blockc: Action: Spend 4 progress. Unlock Gray Forest (Mission). MISSION COMPLETE.

title: Food Source
blocka: Action: +3 Food. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Food track. Burn card.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Action: +3 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Timber track. Burn card.

title: Ore Source
blocka: Action: +3 Ore. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Ore track. Burn card.

title: Mana Source
blocka: Action: +3 Mana. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Mana track. Burn card.

title: Poisonous Dusk Frogs
blocka: Solo Combat: 1. Success: +1 Combat. Burn card. Failure: Exhausted.

title: Rocky Terrain
blocka: Survival: 2. Failure: All characters are weary.

title: Libram of Animation
blocka: Solo Lore: 1. Success: +1 Lore. Burn card. Failure: Weary.

title: Undead Minions
blockd: Team: Test: Combat 2. Failure: +2 discord for group.

title: Trackless Forest
blockb: Effect: While any character at attached location, may use timber resource dice as skill test dice.

title: Grueling Wilds
blocka: Placement: On character with lowest survival.
blockb: Quick: Solo Test: Survival 2. Failure: Weary.
blockc: On Movement: If character moves out of wilderness location, remove condition.
